channel.title: cocoaheads on Blake Merryman
channel.description: Recent content in cocoaheads on Blake Merryman

item.title: Swift Scripts at CocoaHeads
item.description: Speaking of Swift, I delivered a presentation on scripting with Swift at Nashville CocoaHeads at the end of January, earlier this year. Check out the video and head over to the Github repository for the source code and more information.
